DOC.brief_summary: The COBIS registry is multi-center, real-world registry of drug-eluting stenting in coronary bifurcation lesions in South Korea. The aim of the study was to find out the current status of bifurcation drug-eluting stenting and determine the prognostic factors for long-term outcome in South Korea.
DOC.brief_title: Coronary Bifurcation Stenting (COBIS) Registry in South Korea
DOC.criteria: Age >= 18 years Any type of de novo bifurcation lesion with a parent vessel >= 2.5 mm and side branch>= 2.0 mm by visual estimation Treated with drugeluting stent Cardiogenic Shock ST elevation MI within 48hours Expected survival less than 1 year Left main bifurcation Allergy to the antiplatelets
